subject: Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Kent Desormeaux’s decision to move to New York two years ago turned a career on the decline into a chance to complete a Triple Crown at the Belmont Stakes in June.
snippet: Kent Desormeaux’s decision to move to New York two years ago turned a career on the decline into a chance to complete a Triple Crown at the Belmont Stakes in June.
